title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; chat, generate, embed, list models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); supports RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat and generate completions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Conversational CLI wrapper around Ollama with history, roles, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async APIs and streaming support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and model auto-pull.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server containerized.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + ChromaDB + LangChain to chat over your documents.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama; mention the bot in channels or DM to chat with any local model.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI for Ollama with session memory, model picker, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; async client with Tokio, supports chat and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; simple API to chat, generate, pull, and manage models.
